data.message:
So I am currently in the hospital and thought of you...how odd right? Thought I would try something a little new to impress little boy blue and the man on the moon...so here's what I got so far...

Trying to rap,
Like yahtzee I'm just tossing it.

Lets see,
what comes up, 
And what comes out.
Hoping the stupidity,
Doesn't make your brain melt.

Those delta waves,
Rise above.
A notion of emotion.
I try to hide.
Like a sergical blade 
Left in the inside.

I'm Industructable,
"Can't touch this."

Your armour,
And your blade of steel.
Thinking fast 
Trying to keep it real.

Penatrating souls,
Out in the feild.
A doctoral degree,
To say we all feel.

Bouncing off the walls,
Running down the halls, 
Rocking back and forth,
To a beat,
Emmitted from my feet.

Hitting the grind, 
Of backwater streets.
Don't know the meaning, 
Of the word retreat. 

A hospital stay,
That's a little too long.
Insperational enough,
To write a song. 

Am I an inpatient,
Or am I impatient.
I guess we will see.
When the dr. Finally decides, 
To grade and label me.

replies.message: Dope! I wish I could talk fast enough to rap out my verses good job Viral Content Videos
